dashboard.label: Simple XML dashboards - Inline search options

div.h1: Simple XML dashboards - inline search options
div.p: The two panels in this page are table visualizations that use inline search strings. The tables specify the following options:

ul.li: title: Optional. The title that appears in the panel.
searchString: Required. The search that is dispatched every time this view loads. Cannot be combined with 'searchName'.
earliestTime: Optional. The earliest time bound to place on the search. Cannot be used with 'searchName'.
latestTime: Optional. The latest time bound to place on the search. Cannot be used with 'searchName'.
fields: Optional. The field list to apply to results. This is generally used with either 'table', 'event', or 'chart' panels.
